entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. High 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning then southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 21 April 2016
